main event: An observer reported sighting an unidentified object falling toward the earth in Fairborn, Ohio on February 20, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared to be falling extremely fast before leveling off and flying away,The object emitted a dark blinking exhaust that changed to white,The observer felt it was intelligently controlled,Three aircraft were spotted at a higher altitude during the sighting,The observer had a book on flying saucers that contained similar images to what was seen.
witness description: Male, age 49, has read about UFOs and relates his sighting to descriptions in a book by George Adamski.
